welcome_message_body: Welcome to Meaux, France! Known for its charming streets, rich history, and delicious brie cheese, we are delighted to have you here. Enjoy your stay and discover all that our city has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster connection.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal Sud
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Ouest
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
